name: A Tale of Lilies (48 Hours)
description:
48 Hour Entry for SA Game Jam 2020

Brought back from the brink of death itself by strange lilies - you now find yourself in a mystical world where plants grow items. The player can grow heart lilies to survive the raiders.

Controls:
WASD - Movement
Left Click - Interact/Pickup/Melee Attack/Throw Projectile
Shift - Sprint

Gameplay:
Use Watering Can to water plots
Build larger plots to grow crops with higher yields
Some crops can only grow in certain plot sizes
Defeat enemies to get rare seed drops
Explore to find new types of seeds
Heart Lilies are your lives make them count
